price: Maa no kͻͻ Farao ne Haamaan ne Qaarun (Kora) hͻ. Nanso asεm a wͻkaeε nesε: “Nkonyaayini, Nkontomponi “.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
